handgrip_condition.Description: Participant's experiment condition for the IHG task

Levels.Control: Participants do not squeeze the ball during the blue cue
Levels.IHG: Participants squeeze the ball during the blue cue

hormone_group.Description: Participant's hormone group. Note that LU and HC are younger adult women and PM are older adult women

Levels.LU: Luteal group - subjects in the luteal phase of their menstrual cycle
Levels.HC: Hormonal contraceptive group - subjects taking hormonal contraceptive
